name: peppermint
text: Judging prior employment by knuckles? I must have missed that epsiode of House .

name: whitey
text: My old man's childhood best friend lays floors.  Their knuckles are indeed distinct.

name: thing
text: My old man's friend was an Italian ninja. Hard to forget those boobs.

name: sargasm
text: It sounds more like Sherlock Holmes to me, actually.  That sort of attention to detail is accompanied only by a cocaine habit.

name: riazm
text:
House and Holmes.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gregory_House#The_Holmes_Connection]

name: anzio
text:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gregory_House#The_Holmes_Connection[/url]

That's better

name: anzio
text:
Ffffffffffffffffff

Gregory House: The Holmes Connection

Please work.

name: scraggg
text: Not if you've seen any other episode of House you haven't.

name: andyfaewatford
text: Zing!

name: wehavemagnums
text: The Latino Health Crisis does not enjoy Thomas The Tank Engine.

name: jawsh
text: in short, he hate dat train

name: molotovcockatoo
text: Come on, people. "I hate dees train." Instant In-joke, Instant 5.

name: spinynorman
text: I hate that goddamn train, too. Maybe me and him are amigos!

name: firesign
text:
Dammit, spinynorman...
Try as I might, there is no way to envision Stephen Fry saying those words that doesn't just make me sad...

name: littlefatdog
text: "Fleet Street" is an acapella group at Onstad and my school, Stanford U. They are a pretty annoying archetypal acapella group. I wonder what he's got against them.

name: lux
text: I wanted to join when I was at Stanford, but um... ovaries.

name: lastlarf
text: Reuters moved out of Fleet Street some nine months before this strip was put up. They were the last Journalists still there. DC Thomson, who publish the long running British Comics the Beano and the Dandy still have offices there, but Fleet Street really is dead as far as journalism goes.

name: stuart
text: They live on through The National Enquirer & Co.

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dismas, _cheesekayke, mystkmanat, STUART, Darthemed)

name: connellingus
text: It's a little unsettling to see Leander talk after all this time. Dude doesn't have a mouth!

name: foetus_punch
text: Yeah, that made me uncomfortable. I had to get up and leave, gather my head. Also, he was being a dick. Weird. Eerie.

name: heavymetaljesus
text: It takes a stone-cold man to hate Thomas dee Tank Engine.

name: foetus_punch
text: Even a stone cold man couldn't stand up to an Italian ninja with drawings on his boobs.

name: woodenteeth
text: This comic is the first to give a hint at that odd, redneck, authoritarian control that will eventually send out RV's to kick Ray and Beef's asses. First three panels. Pretty damn effective.

name: lrosetw8
text: Mr. Bear looks so cute!! *girly squeal*

name: awko
text:
Man, you gotta watch out for those Italian ninjas with drawings on their boobs.

They will ruin your shit.

name: i_love_kate
text: Leander's neck-vein contest links in with his Black Flag tattoo. I love how such minor characters get those little frissons of continuity.

name: dueledge
text: Is the Italian ninja some kind of reference I'm not getting? either way this is awesome.

name: soticoto
text:
For a while I was sure they were talking about:
[IMGS OFF]

Vega from Street Fighter 2...

... But then I realised Vega is Spanish, and Latino Health Crisis would totally not mistake him for an Italian... right?

It does seem too close to be coincidence though.


(Subtext: I loved playing as Vega back in the SF2 days, because it took real skill... not like those Blanka button-bashers or Hadoken-spammers.)

name: soticoto
text:
Wait a sec. LHC didn't actually call him Italian... so it could still be Vega!

W00t!

SWAN DIVE AIR SUPLEX!
WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!

name: firesign
text: The Latino Health Crisis does not speak english very well. I choose to believe that the perpetrator was merely "a possibly Italian looking fighter with tattoos on his chest", and that the LHC's English vocabulary could only come up with "Italian ninja with drawings on his boobs."

name: valorgigo
text: Why is Ted on Barry's Blackberry? In this strip, Ted is using Barry's Blackberry.

name: i_love_kate
text:
All British people are interchangeable to Onstad.

Isn't that right, I Love Kate?

name: presterjohn
text: Barry is a cross-the-pond version of Ignatius Reilly.

name: scraggg
text: One must have a firm grasp of theology and geometry to win the Great Outdoor Fight.

name: blueshoc12
text: It's comics like these that show the minor things that make this comic so awesome. Teodor has been hitting the refresh button so much he has a callus, and Cornelius, despite his refined ways, not only has a pennant to support Ray, but passed out while waiting for information on his boys. Onstad's story building is unmatched in the comic world.

name: firesign
text: Agreed on the character development, but Teodor has a callus on his finger from refreshing? I think he's just been sitting there with no sleep, is all. I believe you'll find that It'll update automatically.

name: ivanstrel
text: Leander is the guy with the Black Flag tat. Huge Henry Rollins hardon apparently. I can imagine him outside the GOF. All in a cover band with his dad, living with his parents at 34...

name: nyl
text: NOONE hates Thomas The Tank Engine.

name: dtuba
text: WRONG

name: aparrish
text: "Was a bit too busy catching up with Fark" pretty much sums up the state of journalism these days

name: tekende
text: How are they getting TV, let alone Tivo, out there anyway?

name: tonyhighwind
text: I'm inclined to believe that if the guy who dropped Ted wasn't Nice Pete, he was at least a distant relation.  I can't imagine anyone else who could get on The Acres making conversation before they hand you your ass, and killing in those context is something Pete would see as amateurish and/or desperate.

name: tonyhighwind
text: That context, sorry.

name: icecube
text: 4'd. Then it dawned on me: sub-Saharan comb-over . 5'd.

name: carlyle
text:
You know I think Mr. Bear there just looks adorable.

(also I originally typed out delicious instead of adorable what does that say to me)

name: bika
text:
I like to think that pennant Cornelius is slumped on reads simply " YAY ".

Even if I find out later it doesn't, this is what I choose to believe
